body.name: MCQ Upholstered Dining Chairs Set of 4, Modern Upholstered Fabric Dining Room Chair with Nailhead Trim and Wood Legs, Mid-Century Accent Dinner Chair for Living Room, Kitchen, Beige
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 25 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Modern Style】The streamlined silhouette and sleek shape of the dining chair bring an elegant style to the dining room. Numerous decorative rivet insets around the cushion and back add a luxurious and unique feel to our dining room chair. Certainly a perfect piece for your dream home.

【Versatile Usage】The modern dining chair can be widely used for daily dining or special celebrations like wedding banquets and parties, also as a side chair, dining chair or any other ceremonial decorations in the living room, meeting room, hotel, restaurants, etc.

【Durable Construction】Designed with heavy-duty wooden legs for optimum support to guarantee solidity and durability, the kitchen chairs can hold up to 250 lbs. The floor is also protected from scratches thanks to the rubber feet on dining chair legs.

【Excellent Quality】The side chairs are covered with soft linen fabric, which is breathable and easy to clean. The sponge filling of the backrest of the seat provides you with a cozy feeling of support. The high back is designed for super comfy back support based on ergonomic standards.

【Easy to Assemble】Comes with instructions and all necessary hardware and tools, the dinner chairs can be installed within 15 minutes. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us. There are 2 chairs in each box. If customers order a "set of 4" or "set of 6", they will receive 2 or 3 boxes in total. Each box has a different tracking number, so the boxes may arrive on different days, please be patient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AWESOME PRODUCT WITH GREAT VALUE
reviews.reviewText: We needed six chairs for our dinette area. First we went to a local furniture store. Their minimum price for six chairs was $700 plus $110 for delivery. We had to assemble the product ourselves.Then I checked Amazon. A set of better quality chairs was for only $250, free delivery. Of course, we had to assemble the chairs ourselves.The chairs were nicely packed - two in a box. The boxes were easy to receive in our home. Assembly was quite easy. Amazon offered Asurion warranty for $50 for three years.The chairs are very elegant and comfortable. Light weight and special sliders at the bottom of the wooden legs make it easy to slide (or lift) the chairs.All in all, I would highly recommend this product who is looking for high value and high quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better to use a drill
reviews.reviewText: I'll write my honest review because I want people should really know what to expect when buying these chairs .First of all , they're nice ,neat, and comfortable ,elegant , sturdy enough to sit on them , lightweight enough to move them around , when you sit down on them at the table you'll move in smooth while sitting down and when getting up you'll move out smoothly as well, we bought 6 chairs and we're happy.Now when it comes to installation you can see in the customer reviews that it takes very long for assembly , and the holes between the legs and the cushion are not lined up so its very difficult to find the hole to turn in the screws.Which I must say is true , I also watched the installation video here on the site , I have no idea how he turns those screws in with that Allen wrench that comes with it so effortlessly , not in my dreams.We started the first chair by screwing in the middle screw with that Allen wrench enclosed first like it says in the instructions and like he does in the video, for us it was impossible to screw in the other 4 screws with the Allen wrench , 2 at each end , we tried very long and we gave up , and brought the drill out , we have the tool that fits for this screw .We worked differently , we screwed in 1 screw on the right 75 percent then 1 screw on the left 75 percent then the second screw on the right 75 percent then the second screw on the left 75 percent then the screw in the middle , with the drill we were able to match up the holes very quickly , and then we tightened up all the screws 1 by 1 and it worked out very nicely .The other 5 chairs were a breeze , less than 5 minutes per chair to assemble .If you have access to a drill definitely use a drill in this order , corners first then the center screw . We hope to enjoy the chairs for a very long time .Only the 2 front legs have level screws on the bottom , on a few of the chairs even after turning out the level screw to the Max it still wobbles a bit when not sitting on them , once you sit down on those chairs , there's no wobbling whatsoever which is kind of magic but great.Enjoy your chairs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are great. Well made and looks great
reviews.reviewText: Mostly very easy to put together. They sent all the right tools and the holes mostly lined up perfectly. I am having a small amount of trouble with one chair. I’m sure it is solvable. I am very pleased with this project

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The legs are dark. Way dark! If you want a deep dark wood, these are great. If not, a waste of time, ordering, shipping, putting together…base arrives and is much lighter than chairs. Now I have to decide which goes back. Now it’s just a waste of time.
